Additional information
Tulips are vibrant flowers that bring a burst of color to any setting. With their cup-shaped blooms and long, slender stems, they are a symbol of perfect love and new beginnings. Originating from Central Asia, tulips have captivated people's hearts for centuries. Whether in gardens, bouquets, or potted plants, tulips add a touch of elegance and beauty.
